message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a special price of $120. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. $120 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I understand you're looking to spend closer to $100, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can meet you in the middle at $110. Would you be willing to accept that price?
